## RouterComponent.cleanup() method

Cleanup router resources on app stop

NOTE: Original app.once("appStop", ...) listener in router.ts is now unified to be handled by @<!-- -->OnEvent(AppEvent.appStop) decorator

**Signature:**

```typescript
cleanup(_app: KoattyApplication): Promise<void>;
```
